value.title: UK self-driving startup Wayve raises $200 mln to scale up technology
value.excerpt: British self-driving technology startup Wayve said on Tuesday it has raised $200 million from investors to scale up its autonomous driving technology globally and launch more pilot projects with commercial fleet partners.

value.title: New York Times ad warns against Tesla’s “Full Self-Driving”
value.excerpt: A full page advertisement in Sunday’s New York Times took aim at Tesla’s “Full Self-Driving” software, calling it “the worst software ever sold by a Fortune 500 company” and offering $10,000, the same price as the software itself to the first person who could

value.title: Waymo, J.B. Hunt plan to reach fully autonomous truck transport in Texas in ‘next few years’
value.excerpt: Waymo has been developing its primary operations center in Texas, which is expected to potentially accommodate hundreds of trucks and personnel.

value.title: Here’s What That Engaging And Wildly Popular Game Wordle Can Teach You About AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: An online game known as Wordle has suddenly become a social media darling and everyone is playing, which it turns out there are aspects that can shed light on AI self-driving cars.

value.title: J.B. Hunt will be Waymo’s first self-driving freight customer
value.excerpt: Waymo Via, the autonomous vehicle company’s trucking and cargo transportation unit, is expanding its existing partnership with logistics company J.B. Hunt Transport Services from a pilot into a long-term strategic alliance.

value.title: China’s robotaxis charged ahead in 2021
value.excerpt: Autonomous driving startups in China are in an arms race to put passengers in their machine-driven vehicles. Every few weeks, news arrives that another major player has got the greenlight to launch a new pilot program or a small-scale service.

value.title: AI-Driven Asset Management Startup, Catapulted To Fame By Tesla Trades, Raises $146M From SoftBank
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence-focused fintech group Qraft Technologies Inc. said it has received a $146 million investment from Japanese conglomerate SoftBank Group Corp. (OTC: SFTBY).

value.title: Electric Vehicle Checkpoint: Tesla Will Raise Price of Self-Driving Feature
value.excerpt: See the latest news for the top stocks in the electric vehicle space including Ford, Rivian, Lucid, Nio, and more.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence in Security Market to See Booming Growth | Acalvio, Cylance, IBM, Micron
value.excerpt: Advance Market Analytics published a new research publication on Artificial Intelligence in Security Market Insights to 2026 with 232 pages and enriched with self explained Tables and charts in presentable format In the Study you will find new evolving Trends

value.title: RTA forum reviews traffic rules of driverless flying taxis in Dubai
value.excerpt: DUBAI- Dubai’s Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) has recently held the first legal forum to review the rules and regulations governing operations for passenger transport autonomous air vehicles. This preliminary step aims to chart out suitable structures and develop rules and regulations required for the operation of this ultra-advanced mode of future transportation.

value.title: Nuro Add Airbags (for People) to Self-Driving Delivery Vehicles
value.excerpt: Pedestrians can be an absent-minded bunch, so Nuro's newest delivery bot adds an external airbag to protect those who may collide with it on the sidewalk.

value.title: California’s DMV Reevaluating Stance On Tesla’s Full Self-Driving Beta
value.excerpt: The DMV had previously considered Tesla's FSD as a Level 2 system, but videos and software updates are forcing a rethink

value.title: California May Finally Regulate Tesla's "Full Self-Driving" Beta Test
value.excerpt: California allows vehicle manufacturers to implement Level 2 systems in production vehicles but has much more stringent requirements for tests of any semi-autonomous system meant to move further up the chain.

value.title: Nuro announces 3rd-gen driverless delivery vehicle
value.excerpt: The cute little Nuro pod gets a big cargo upgrade and new sensors. Remember Nuro? You know, they make the cute little driverless delivery pods and they've partnered with companies like Kroger, FedEx,

value.title: AI: FutureAI Raises $2 Million to Develop Artificial General Intelligence
value.excerpt: Today, FutureAI, an early-stage deep technology startup, announced that it has raised $2 million in an initial funding round. The company is developing artificial general intelligence (AGI) that replicates facets of the true understanding common to all human beings.

value.title: Tesla could be forced to report Full Self-Driving Beta data to DMV after ‘videos showing dangerous use’
value.excerpt: Tesla, who managed to avoid reporting autonomous driving data to the DMV, could be forced to open the books on its Full Self-Driving (FSD) Beta to the California DMV after what the latter called “videos showing dangerous use”.

value.title: Tesla Full Self-Driving has an 'Assertive' mode that can make rolling stops
value.excerpt: Tesla's polarizing Full Self-Driving beta software is back with another round of controversy. Now included with the software are profiles that change the behavior of the software, and one selection may engage in behavior that violates US traffic laws.

value.title: University of Cambridge: Community of ethical hackers needed to prevent AI’s looming ‘crisis of trust’
value.excerpt: The Artificial Intelligence industry should create a global community of hackers and 'threat modellers' dedicated to stress-testing the harm potential of new AI products in order to earn the trust of governments and the public before it’s too late.

value.title: Elon Musk reveals another Tesla “Full Self-Driving” price increase
value.excerpt: Tesla may be credited for turning the automotive industry on its head and pushing forward battery-powered cars and power solutions, but that might not be what it’s remembered for. Company

value.title: Watch this self-driving racecar go 173 mph with no human driver inside
value.excerpt: Autonomous racecars competed head-to-head at the Indy Autonomous Challenge at CES. The competition aims to improve self-driving technology for use on and off the racetrack.

value.title: This Robot Trader Is Betting on Big Gains for Tesla and Nvidia Stock. It’s Been Right Before.
value.excerpt: This artificial intelligence-powered ETF ditched Netflix, Merck, and three other familiar stocks this month. Here's what it bought.

value.title: Tesla and Nvidia Are Picked for Big Gains by This Robot Trader. It’s Been Right Before.
value.excerpt: This artificial intelligence-powered ETF ditched Netflix, Merck, and three other familiar stocks this month. Here's what it bought.

value.title: Robot trucks get US tests, raising self-driving safety stakes
value.excerpt: Shipping companies and software developers are experimenting with self-driving trucks as a way to solve a driver shortage worsened by the Covid-19 pandemic, drawing fire from safety advocates who call the technology a risk to motorists.

value.title: Elon Musk says Tesla will raise price of "Full Self-Driving" driver assistance to $12,000
value.excerpt: In a series of posts on Twitter, where he has 69.2 million followers, Musk wrote, "Tesla FSD price rising to $12k on Jan 17. Just in the US."

value.title: Flagging Down A Roaming AI Self-Driving Car Robo-Taxi Might Not Be In The Cards
value.excerpt: Flagging down a taxi or cab is still something done today, and the question arises whether AI-based self-driving car robo-taxis will do the same.

value.title: AI Weekly: The implications of self-driving tractors and coming AI regulations
value.excerpt: AI regulations are on the way from governments including China. Plus, driverless tractors have reached the market -- with caveats.

value.title: Tesla announces Full Self-Driving package price increase to $12,000
value.excerpt: Tesla announced today that it is going to increase the price of its Full Self-Driving package to $12,000 starting on January 17. It should coincide with the release of an important new update. The Price of Tesla’s Full Self-Driving (FSD) package has been somewhat controversial.

value.title: New controversy in making? Tesla wants only cameras, AI to go fully autonomous
value.excerpt: Tesla chief Elon Musk has shared that the EV company will make a system based on cameras and artificial intelligence to attain full autonomy in driving.

value.title: The First Model From Baidu's New EV Brand JiDU to Use the NVIDIA DRIVE Orin System-on-a-Chip to Support L4 Autonomous Driving
value.excerpt: JiDU Automotive, the new electric vehicle venture formed by China’s internet technology giant Baidu Inc and Chinese automaker Geely, will use the powerful NVIDIA DRIVE Orin system-on-a-chip (SoC) in its first model to support L4 autonomous driving capabilities,
